plan_name: Star Cancer Care Platinum Insurance Policy
post_hospitalization_days: 60 days (up to 2% of the basic sum insured per hospitalization)
day_care: All day care procedures are covered (Actuals)
modern_treatments: Covered up to the Sub-limits mentioned in the policy clause
no_claim_bonus: 5% of basic sum insured for each claim free year subject to a maximum of 50%
wellness_program: Diet and Nutrition Program, Weight Management Program, Specialist Consultation available through Star Telehealth app
preventive_health_checkup: Up to Rs 2,500 for every claim free year

waiting_periods.initial: 30 days for all illness (Except for accidents)

optional_covers: Lump sum cover for Cancer (50% of Section 1 sum insured, payable on recurrence, metastasis, and/or a second malignancy unrelated to first cancer, waiting period: 30 months)
